::: {#group-section}
<!-- Group Logo and Description Section -->
<div class="group-header">
  <div class="logo-and-tagline">
  <img src="pics/logo_bright.png" alt="EcoSense Group Logo" class="group-logo">
  <p class="tagline"><b>Eco</b> — Ecology / Ecosystems<br><b>Sense</b> — Sensing (remote sensing, monitoring) <br> + Intelligent understanding</p>
  </div>
  <div class="group-description-box">
  <p>
      <b>We are ecologists dedicated to advancing the understanding of how terrestrial ecosystems interact with climate using a variety of tools:</b>
      <ul>
        <li>Satellite remote sensing (Solar-induced chlorophyll fluorescence, Optical remote sensing, Thermal remote sensing)</li>
        <li>Artificial intelligence (Interoperable AI, Process-informed machine learning)</li>
        <li>Land surface modeling to better represent carbon and water fluxes</li>
      </ul>
  </p>
  <p>
      <b>Our research aims to bridge fundamental ecological science with real-world applications that deliver socioeconomic benefits, including but not limited to:</b>
      <ul>
        <li>Enhancing forest management to increase carbon sequestration</li>
        <li>Improving crop yields to support food security</li>
        <li>Mitigating urban heat to protect public health</li>
      </ul>
  </p>
  </div>
</div>
:::
